1100011000111101 1010101110000111 1 -> sum: 0111000111000101, cout: 1

0000010000100010 0111010111111010 1 -> sum: 0111101000011101, cout: 0
1001001100101000 0010111101110111 0 -> sum: 1100001010011111, cout: 0
0000000100011100 0100010101001100 1 -> sum: 0100011001101001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
